FORM.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf local BuffUI = GetUIWnd("FRM_BUFF") if not BuffUI:IsNil() then local Size = kSelf:GetSize() local Loc = kSelf:GetLocation() Loc:SetY(Loc:GetY() + Size:GetY()) BuffUI:SetLocation(Loc) end OnRecoveryMiniQuest(false)
local kSelf = UISelf local BuffUI = GetUIWnd("FRM_BUFF") if not BuffUI:IsNil() then local Loc = kSelf:GetLocation() BuffUI:SetLocation(Loc) end OnRecoveryMiniQuest(true)

STATIC_FORM.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf local Img = kSelf:GetControl("IMG_STATE") if not Img:IsNil() then Img:SetUVIndex(kSelf:GetBuildIndex() + 1) kSelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTT(201089 + kSelf:GetBuildIndex())) end

EDIT.SCRIPT: local cust = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() if cust == 0 then UISelf:SetEditFocus(true) UISelf:SetCustomDataAsInt(1) end
local cust = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() if cust == 0 then UISelf:SetEditFocus(true) UISelf:SetCustomDataAsInt(1) end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf OnClickTownBoardTownNumberItem(kSelf) kSelf:GetParent():GetParent():Close() return true
local kSelf = UISelf OnClickMinimapTownNumPopupItem(kSelf) kSelf:GetParent():GetParent():Close() return true
local kSelf = UISelf OnClickTownBoardListViewTypeItem(kSelf) kSelf:GetParent():GetParent():Close() return true
local kSelf = UISelf OnClickHomeRegistDayDropItem(kSelf) kSelf:GetParent():GetParent():Close() return true

STATIC_FORM.SCRIPT: local UIEdit = UISelf:GetControl("EDT_INVITE_USER_NAME") if not UIEdit:IsNil() then UIEdit:SetEditText("") UIEdit:SetCustomDataAsInt(0) end

local UIEdit = UISelf:GetControl("EDT_INVITE_USER_NAME") if not UIEdit:IsNil() then local cust = UIEdit:GetCustomDataAsInt() if cust == 0 then UIEdit:SetEditFocus(true) UIEdit:SetCustomDataAsInt(1) end end

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: local Type = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() local bAllOn = true if 0 == Type then UISelf:SetCustomDataAsInt(1) else UISelf:SetCustomDataAsInt(0) bAllOn = false end ChangeAllListChkBtn("SFRM_HOME_USE_DECO", "LIST_DECO_LIST", "CBTN_CHECK", bAllOn)
